column2: A single chamber with limited security.
A large haven with good security.
A grand mansion with impressive security.
A castle guard can be bribed to overlook crimes, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a castle guard sergeant and his squad have come under your sway.
The castle guard has come under your control.
You have ghouled a baron and control his keep and guards.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a castle guard.
A militiaman can be bribed to overlook crimes, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a militia sergeant and his squad have come under your sway.
The militia has come under your control.
You have ghouled a militia commander and can call up the militia for "training".
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a militia.
A squire can be bribed to steal, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a knight and his retainers have come under your sway.
A Knightly Order have come under your control.
You have ghouled the Commander of a Knightly Order.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition an order of knights.
Serving wenches can be paid for information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a cook and several patrons have come under your sway.
Large inn has come under your control.
You have ghouled the inn keeper of a large inn.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and patrons of a large inn.
Smugglers can be paid to transport secret cargo.
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a ring of smugglers come under your sway.
Fleet of pirates has come under your control.
You have ghouled a pirate lord.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a fleet of pirates.
A bandit can be bribed to steal, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a bandit lieutenant and his crew have come under your sway.
A band of Bandits have come under your control.
You have ghouled the leader of a band of bandits.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a band of bandits.
A kennel for hellhounds (ghouled war dogs)
Elaborate labryinth of tunnels controlled by Nosfeartu

A safe meeting place for Kindred to meet, socialize and resolve differences non-violent.  Engaging in violence in an Elysium--even while in frenzy--is regarded as a serious crime.  Keeper of Elysium is a minor title associated with keeping the peace in such locations.
A single chamber with limited security.
A large haven with good security.
A grand mansion with impressive security.
A temple guard can be bribed to overlook crimes, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a temple guard sergeant and his squad have come under your sway.
The temple guard has come under your control.
You have ghouled a Temple Guard Commander and control his temple and guards.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a temple guard.
Acolytes can be paid for information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a monkish brother and other pilgrims have come under your sway.
Large monastery has come under your control.
You have ghouled the Abbot of a large monastery.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and patrons of a large monastery.
Nuns can be paid for information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a sister and several acolytes have come under your sway.
Large nunnery has come under your control.
You have ghouled the Mother Superior of a large nunnery.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the nuns and pilgrims of a large nunnery.
Smugglers can be paid to transport secret cargo.
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a ring of smugglers come under your sway.
Fleet of pirates has come under your control.
You have ghouled a pirate lord.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a fleet of pirates.
A kennel for hellhounds (ghouled war dogs)
Elaborate labryinth of tunnels controlled by Nosfeartu

A safe meeting place for Kindred to meet, socialize and resolve differences non-violent.  Engaging in violence in an Elysium--even while in frenzy--is regared as a serious crime.  Keeper of Elysium is a minor title associated with keeping the peace in such locations.
A single chamber with limited security.
A large haven with good security.
A grand mansion with impressive security.
Whores can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a street pimp, his harem of whores and gang of petty enforcers has come under your sway.
Large brothel catering to all ends of the social scale has come under your control.
You have ghouled the madam of a large brothel catering to all ends of the social scale.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff of a large brothel catering to all ends of the social scale.
Influenced City Guard Night Watch Sergeant
Ghouled City Guard Night Watch Commander
A city guard watchman can be bribed to overlook crimes, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a city guard night watch sergeant and his squad have come under your sway.
The city guard night watch has come under your control.
You have ghouled the commander of the city guard night watch.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition the city guard night watch.
Drunks can be paid for information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a bartender, a bouncer and a bunch of drunks have come under your sway.
Large tavern has come under your control.
You have ghouled the owner of a large tavern.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and patrons of a large tavern.
Smugglers can be paid to transport secret cargo.
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a ring of smugglers come under your sway.
Fleet of pirates has come under your control.
You have ghouled a pirate lord.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a fleet of pirates.
A thief can be bribed to steal, provide information, provide some muscle, etc...
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a street gang lieutenant and his crew have come under your sway.
A street gang has come under your control.
You have ghouled the boss of the street gang.
You have used your discipline of domination to condition a street gang.

Elaborate labryinth of tunnels controlled by Nosfeartu
